addon.name: [COLOR royalblue]Freeworld[/COLOR][COLOR yellow] Addon[/COLOR][COLOR red] R[/COLOR][COLOR white]epository[/COLOR]

extension.description: [COLOR coral]Freeworld Repository free and open source developed by the Freeworld Entertainment Group,Freeworld Repo is available for multiple operating-systems and hardware platforms, featuring the best Addons Program Scripts and Repository Always Update.The Plugin.Video.Addon allows users to play and view most videos, music, podcasts, and other digital media files from local and network storage media and the internet.[/COLOR]
